resources:
QuizzApp Name E-mail Take the quiz! Welcome, 
 
Here are ten lines from the repertoire of Bruce Springsteen. Can you guess the song? Send results!
Congratulations You answered out of 13 correct
Well done so far!

Here are three bonus questions to really test your knowledge of Bruce Springsteen. In which city was Bruce Springsteen born? How many albums did Bruce Springsteen? To the results! check! Whicht of these album are made by Bruce? // These are the questions
//Question 1 Question 1: 
 
I'm sick of sitting 'round here trying to write this book I'm On Fire Dancing In The Dark Born To Run Dancing In The Dark //Question 2 Question 2: 
 
I'm laughing at you, you're laughing at me Fade Away Tunnel Of Love One Step Up Tunnel Of Love //Question 3 Question 3: 
 
I didn't know my own face Born In The USA One Step Up Streets of Philadelphia Streets of Philadelphia //Question 4 Question 4: 
 
I want to guard your dreams and visions War Born To Run Waitin' On A Sunny Day Born To Run // Question 5 Question 5: 
 
Promise me baby you won't let them find us Cover Me Secret Garden Human Touch Cover Me // Question 6 Question 6: 
 
I guess it's two years gone by now Santa Claus Is Comin' to Town Glory Days Born In The USA Glory Days // Question 7 Question 7: 
 
You and me, we were the pretenders Human Touch Tunnel Of Love Dancing In The Dark Human Touch // Question 8 Question 8: 
 
You end up like a dog that's been beat too much Streets of Philadelphia War Born In The USA Born In The USA // Question 9 Question 9: 
 
No wedding day smiles, no walk down the aisle Cover Me Waitin' On A Sunny Day The River The River // Question 10 Question 10: 
 
I saw you last night, out on the edge of town Brilliant Disguise One Step Up Fade Away Brilliant Disguise
